ticket.title: Auto link test with other protocols missing file test
ticket.original-body: There was a missing test to file scheme from last commits related to auto_link and different protocols, such as "ftp:" and "file:". This was done based on the comment message in this commit: http://github.com/rails/rails/commit/bd9ca9aed0b5ab3697a7ae27a53664f3118b132c#L1R374
